talk.author: did:plc:muaggdpoomfuu4n34g4z44ix
talk.utter: Oh for God's sake, you don't get to vote for the person and not the policy. It's a package deal. They made their choices, pardon me if I am not empathetic about the pain they are about to go through. I'll save that for the people who voted against it who will suffer

talk.author: did:plc:h4f4qdtqobfrfl66qouho5lo
talk.utter: The fact that everyone assumes the people who voted for him know as much about his policies as the very online people talking about them is sort of a problem.

talk.author: did:plc:muaggdpoomfuu4n34g4z44ix
talk.utter: Every single person had access to the information. It was on TV, in print and online media, on the news every single night. Anyone who claims they didnâ€™t know is willfully ignorant and that in and of itself is a choice also undeserving of empathy
